newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portuguese escudo rock steady after rate cut.
newsitem.headline: Portuguese escudo rock steady after rate cut.

text.p: The escudo showed no reaction to the Bank of Portugal's surprise decision on Friday to cut its repurchase pact rate by 30 basis points to 6.0 percent.
The currency was trading at 100.60 to the mark after the announcement, unchanged on earlier levels.
"Mark-escudo was calm and that was how it remained after the announcement, without any reaction," said one trader.
